entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 08:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
